definition: A group of individuals organized and united by a common purpose or goal, typically associated with sports or military activities.

examples.german: Die Mannschaft besteht aus elf Spielern.
examples.english: The team consists of eleven players.

examples.german: Die Mannschaft hat einen neuen Trainer.
examples.english: The team has a new coach.

examples.german: Die Mannschaft spielt in der ersten Liga.
examples.english: The team plays in the first league.
